text: Happer may refer to: ==People== * William Happer (born 1939), U.S. physicist, specializing in atomic and atmospheric physics * William Murray Happer (born 1972), U.S. pro-wrestler * Felix Happer, the character played by Burt Lancaster in the 1983 film Local Hero. ==Science and technology== * 7345 Happer, a Mars-crossing asteroid discovered on July 28, 1992 by Robert H. McNaught at Siding Spring. ==See also== * Harper (name)
title: Happer
